mapper.select: SELECT D.DOCTR_DATE, C.CODE_NM, T.DOC_EMP_NM FROM COMMON_CODE C INNER JOIN DOCTOR_SCHDUL D ON(D.DOCWK_CODE = C.CODE_ID) INNER JOIN DOCTOR_DTL T ON (D.DOC_EMP_NO = T.DOC_EMP_NO)
SELECT N.NURSE_DATE, C.CODE_NM, T.NUR_EMP_NM FROM COMMON_CODE C INNER JOIN nurse_schdul N ON(N.NURWK_CODE = C.CODE_ID) INNER JOIN NURSE_DTL T ON (N.EMP_NO = T.EMP_NO)

SELECT D.DOCTR_DATE, C.CODE_NM, T.DOC_EMP_NM, T.FCLTY_CODE FROM COMMON_CODE C INNER JOIN DOCTOR_SCHDUL D ON(D.DOCWK_CODE = C.CODE_ID) INNER JOIN DOCTOR_DTL T ON (D.DOC_EMP_NO = T.DOC_EMP_NO) WHERE T.FCLTY_CODE = #{fcltyCode}

SELECT N.NURSE_DATE, C.CODE_NM, T.NUR_EMP_NM, T.FCLTY_CODE FROM COMMON_CODE C INNER JOIN nurse_schdul N ON(N.NURWK_CODE = C.CODE_ID) INNER JOIN NURSE_DTL T ON (N.EMP_NO = T.EMP_NO) WHERE T.FCLTY_CODE = #{fcltyCode}
SELECT NRSNOTE_CODE , NURWK_CODE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NRSNOTE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') "nrsnoteDate" , NRSNOTE_NM , EMP_NO , NRSNOTE_CONTENT FROM NURSENOTE ORDER BY NRSNOTE_DATE DESC
SELECT NRSNOTE_CONTENT , NRSNOTE_DATE , NRSNOTE_NM , NURWK_CODE FROM NURSENOTE WHERE NRSNOTE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
